description: This file defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' used for unit testing. It inherits from interfaces in WPEFramework, including IShell and IShell::ICOMLink, and uses Google Mock to create mock methods for those interfaces. The class is intended for mocking the behavior of a service in tests.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock class implementing WPEFramework interfaces for testing purposes, providing mock methods for service behavior.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns a string representing the version. Mocked method.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Returns a string representing the locator. Mocked method.

methods.name: ClassName
methods.description: Returns the class name as string. Mocked method.

methods.name: Callsign
methods.description: Returns the callsign as string. Mocked method.

methods.name: WebPrefix
methods.description: Returns the web prefix as string. Mocked method.

methods.name: ConfigLine
methods.description: Returns configuration line as string. Mocked method.

methods.name: PersistentPath
methods.description: Returns persistent storage path as string. Mocked method.

methods.name: VolatilePath
methods.description: Returns volatile storage path as string. Mocked method.

methods.name: DataPath
methods.description: Returns data storage path as string. Mocked method.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns current state. Mocked method.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Returns true if resumed, false otherwise. Mocked method.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks support for a given feature via uint8_t parameter. Mocked method.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables web server with provided parameters. Mocked method.

methods.name: DisableWebServer
methods.description: Disables the web server. Mocked method.

methods.name: SubSystems
methods.description: Returns a pointer to ISubSystem. Mocked method.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a request with specific id and JSON element. Mocked method.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with given strings. Mocked method.

methods.name: QueryInterfaceByCallsign
methods.description: Queries connection by call sign. Mocked method.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification. There are multiple overloads.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a notification. Multiple overloads.

methods.name: Model
methods.description: Returns model as string. Mocked method.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Returns background status. Mocked method.

methods.name: Accessor
methods.description: Returns accessor string. Mocked method.

methods.name: ProxyStubPath
methods.description: Returns proxy stub path. Mocked method.

methods.name: HashKey
methods.description: Returns hash key as string. Mocked method.

methods.name: Substitute
methods.description: Returns substituted string for input. Mocked method.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates with reason parameter. Mocked method.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates with reason parameter. Mocked method.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks as unavailable with reason. Mocked method.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Returns the reason for current state. Mocked method.

methods.name: ConfigLine (overloaded)
methods.description: Sets configuration line with string parameter. Mocked method.

methods.name: SystemRootPath
methods.description: Returns system root path. Mocked method.

methods.name: SystemPath
methods.description: Returns system path. Mocked method.

methods.name: PluginPath
methods.description: Returns plugin path. Mocked method.

methods.name: StartMode
methods.description: Returns start mode. Overloaded methods for startmode enum and WPEFramework::Core::hresult.

methods.name: Resumed (overloaded)
methods.description: Sets resumed state with bool. Mocked method.

methods.name: Metadata
methods.description: Retrieves metadata. Mocked method.

methods.name: Hibernate
methods.description: Hibernate with reason code. Mocked method.

methods.name: RemoteConnection
methods.description: Returns remote connection pointer for given ID. Mocked method.

methods.name: Instantiate
methods.description: Instantiates RPC object. Mocked method.

methods.name: GetLibrarySearchPaths
methods.description: Returns search paths for libraries. Mocked method.
